page.title: 11SKERRIES EDUCATION
page.content: Skerries school is very small with only{15}pupils,{10 primary}and {5 secondary,}but we go up to{O-grades just like any other school. There are 2 teachers, 2 instructors, 1 auxiliary and 1 voluntary instuctor. The head teacher teaches{Geography, History, {French}and most of the{English. The other secondary teacher who works part time with his wife the primary teacher teaches{Maths, Arithmetic, {Computer, Science,}some{P.E.}and some English. The other teacher works in the primary teaching all subjects. The{Woodwork}instructor teaches in a very small room but with a fairiy good selection of tools.{H.E.}is taught in the school kitchen so there is a good selection of equipment. The voluntary instructor teaches{R.E.}and some P.E. which takes place in the community hall as there is no school gym.
